notes: [New] SN: Search using asterisk when return no results.
[New] Store information about user accesses and searches performed.
[New] Reports - Generates access report, including targeting rules.
[New] Latest searches - Allows you to show the latest searches performed by the user
[New] Spotlight - Show featured content in search terms based on terms. Search positions can be defined.
[New] Multi language - Can have multiple languages ​​for each site, using a language-specific solr core. During indexing you can define which language will be indexed.
[New] Access Logs - Generate turing access log.
[New] Did you mean? - It is now possible to parameterize to show "What did you mean?" showing and correcting the search term automatically.
[New] Merge provider - If two indexing sources are from the same indexed content, you can use the Merge Provider to merge these content, for example: Indexing the same page by WEM and Apache Nutch.
[New] Dynamic Fields: Text, Description and Date.
[Improved] Check Box fields on SN were fixed.
[Improved] Remove newline and trim to concatenated Text.
